gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.converter

Class HiveAvroToFlattenedOrcConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.Converter<Schema,Schema,QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity,QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity>
      • gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.converter.AbstractAvroToOrcConverter
        • gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.converter.HiveAvroToFlattenedOrcConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FinalState, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class HiveAvroToFlattenedOrcConverter
extends AbstractAvroToOrcConverter
    An Avro to ORC converter for avro to flattened ORC. OrcFormats#FLATTENED_ORC

      • hasConversionConfig

        protected boolean hasConversionConfig()
        Return true if flattened orc configurations are available. False otherwise

        This method is called by AbstractAvroToOrcConverter.convertRecord(Schema, QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity, WorkUnitState) before building the conversion query. Subclasses can find out if conversion is enabled for their format by calling ConvertibleHiveDataset.getConversionConfigForFormat(String) on the hiveDataset.
        Available ORC formats are defined by the enum AbstractAvroToOrcConverter.OrcFormats

        If this method returns false, no Avro to to ORC conversion queries will be built for the ORC format.

        Specified by:
        hasConversionConfig in class AbstractAvroToOrcConverter
        Returns:
        true if conversion is required. false otherwise
        See Also:
        AbstractAvroToOrcConverter.hasConversionConfig()
